scriptLines: body as ({@odata.context} as string, days as string[], enabled as boolean, localTimeZoneId as string, notifyOption as string, times as string[]),

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT BatchNo, TenantId 
FROM [dbo].[DataFlows_batch] 
WHERE TenantId = ', string(pipeline().parameters.TenantId), 
' ORDER BY 1')

@concat (
    'EXEC [dbo].[sp_ChildPipelineLog_Insert] ',
    '''', 'Started', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().Pipeline, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().RunId, '''', ',',
    '''', convertTimeZone(utcnow(),'UTC','India Standard Time'), '''', ',',
    '''', '', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerName, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerType, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerTime, '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().parameters.TenantId, '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', ''''
)

value.value:
@if(and(and(and(and(
equals(variables('Get Dataflowsrefreshes Status'),'Succeeded'),
equals(variables('DataflowRefreshes Staging Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('DataflowRefreshesLive Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('Get Dataflowsrefreshes Batch'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('DataflowRefreshes History Status'),'Succeeded')),
'Succeeded','Failed')
